                      throws java.rmi.RemoteException

      • getManagerHeartbeat

        public java.lang.String getManagerHeartbeat()
                                     throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Description copied from interface: HwManagerInterface
        Hw_Computer calls this to confirm existence of the Hw_Manager. Only useful in that Hw_Computer knows to reinitiate a connection if this fails. Hw_Computers thus always retry connections.
        Specified by:
        getManagerHeartbeat in interface HwManagerInterface
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
